AboutPage.description: This site is a web application for bidirectional translation between Ainu and Japanese. It is currently available on a trial basis for Ainu language learners.
AboutPage.title: About This Site

Home.description: tunci is a web application for translating between Ainu and Japanese. It is currently available on a trial basis for Ainu language learners.
Home.title: tunci - Translate between Ainu and Japanese

AdvancedSettingsDialogContent.description: You can modify vocabulary and grammar settings to generate more natural sentences.
AdvancedSettingsDialogContent.title: Expression Settings

DialectSelector.description: There is no standard Ainu language; different regions use different expressions. You can select a region and generate sentences in that regional dialect.
DialectSelector.title: Regional Settings

PronounSelector.description: In Ainu, different words are used in daily conversation and storytelling. You can choose which type of language to use.
PronounSelector.title: Everyday vs. Elegant Language

AlternativeTranslationsContent.description: Here are some alternative expressions you can use:

AlternativeTranslationsError.description: An error occurred while retrieving data. Please try again later.

Disclaimer.disclaimer: The information may be inaccurate. To avoid spreading incorrect Ainu expressions, please refrain from using the translation results as-is.
Disclaimer.title: Disclaimer

EndpointStatus.initializing: The server is starting up. Please wait about one minute. To save costs, the server automatically shuts down if inactive for more than {scaleToZeroTimeout} minutes.
EndpointStatus.paused: The server is temporarily paused. Please contact the administrator.
EndpointStatus.pending: The server is preparing to start. Please wait about one minute. To save costs, the server automatically shuts down if inactive for more than {scaleToZeroTimeout} minutes.
EndpointStatus.scaledToZero: The server instance is currently at zero.

ExampleSentencesError.description: An error occurred while retrieving data. Please try again later.
